name: Hunkie Dory
title: The Threshold
desc: An elderly man that sits atop his throne of choice: a rocking chair on his front porch. He has a hot wife and three hot daughters.^"Don't touch my daughters."

name: Jade
title: The Threshold
desc: A Ghoran druid who will stop at nothing to hunt the woman who ate them alive.^"Teeth on your bones, bugs under your skin, left all alone, and shivering within..."

name: Varsival
title: The Threshold
desc: An elderly Elven druid who lives alone in a wizard tower near the Misty Lake. He is a reclusive hermit, but is willing to help when someone reaches out.^"Well, wasn't this one rather exhausting..."

name: Twill
title: The Threshold
desc: This chaotic goblin gremlin is a skilled trapper, perfectly complementing Breena's hunting skills. The two make a strong and strange couple.
